item.title: LG has released an updated version of the TONE INIFINIM around-the-neck wireless headset just in time for CES
item.description:
Source: LG. The TONE INFINIM HBS-910 headsets will debut at CES 2016. LG Electronics (LG) will introduce its latest LG TONE INFINIM (HBS-910) headsets at CES 2016. The wireless neckband headset boasts a modernized design and exceptional audio quality. As the next generation of the HBS-900, the new TONE INFINIM retains key features of its predecessor, like retractable earbuds and Harmon/Kardon audio. It also introduces upgraded Quad-Layer Speaker Technology for a top-tier audio experience with enhanced balance across the entire sound spectrum...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lg-has-released-an-updated-version-of-the-tone-inifinim-around-the-neck-wireless-headset-just-in-time-for-ces/
